tutorials.title: Enum
tutorials.description: The choice between inline and separate HTML is a matter of taste, circumstances, and organization policy. Here the app uses inline HTML because the template is small and the demo is simpler without the additional HTML file.The choice between inline and separate HTML is a matter of taste, circumstances, and organization policy. tutorials.title: Compare
tutorials.description: You can store your component's template in one of two places. You can define it inline using the template property, or you can define the template in a separate HTML file and link to it in the component metadata using the @Component decorator's templateUrl property.
